instruction: create a steel smelting chain, with a burner mining drill and 2 stone furnaces.
objective: create a steel smelting chain, with a burner mining drill and 2 stone furnaces.
steps:
To create a steel smelting chain with a burner mining drill and 2 stone furnaces in Factorio, you can follow these steps:

1. Place a burner mining drill on an iron ore patch.

2. Place two stone furnaces near the burner mining drill.

3. Set up the first stone furnace to smelt iron ore into iron plates:
   - Use an inserter to move iron ore from the burner mining drill to the first stone furnace.

4. Set up the second stone furnace to smelt iron plates into steel:
   - Use an inserter to move iron plates from the first stone furnace to the second stone furnace.

5. Fuel management:
   - Manually add coal or wood to the burner mining drill and both stone furnaces until you can automate this process.

6. Optional improvements:
   - Add a chest between the furnaces to store excess iron plates.
   - Set up a coal mining operation nearby to fuel the machines more efficiently.

Remember that this setup is very basic and slow. For larger-scale production, you'll want to upgrade to electric mining drills, more furnaces, and eventually electric furnaces with modules and beacons for increased efficiency.

corrections.snippet:
# Find the nearest iron ore patch
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
assert iron_ore_position, "No iron ore patch found"

# Place burner mining drill on iron ore patch
burner_drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, Direction.UP, iron_ore_position)
assert burner_drill, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Burner mining drill placed at {burner_drill.position}")

# Place two stone furnaces near the burner mining drill
furnace1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace1, "Failed to place first stone furnace"
print(f"First stone furnace placed at {furnace1.position}")

furnace2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace2, "Failed to place second stone furnace"
print(f"Second stone furnace placed at {furnace2.position}")

# Place inserters between entities
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter1, "Failed to place first inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"First inserter placed at {inserter1.position}")

inserter2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter2, "Failed to place second inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"Second inserter placed at {inserter2.position}")

# Set recipes for furnaces
set_entity_recipe(furnace1, Prototype.IronPlate)
set_entity_recipe(furnace2, Prototype.Steel)

# Add fuel to entities (assuming coal is in inventory)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, burner_drill, 5)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace1, 5)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace2, 5)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter1, 1)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter2, 1)

# Verify setup
entities = inspect_entities(burner_drill.position, radius=10)
assert any(e.name == "burner-mining-drill" for e in entities.entities), "Burner mining drill not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "stone-furnace") == 2, "Two stone furnaces not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "burner-inserter") == 2, "Two burner inserters not found in inspection"

print("Steel smelting chain setup complete and verified")

corrections.snippet:
# Find the nearest iron ore patch within reach
iron_ore_position = None
for radius in range(1, 11):  # Start from 1 to avoid checking the player's position
    entities = inspect_entities(radius=radius)
    for entity in entities.entities:
        if entity.name == "iron-ore":
            iron_ore_position = entity.position
            break
    if iron_ore_position:
        break

assert iron_ore_position, "No iron ore patch found within reach"

# Place burner mining drill on iron ore patch
burner_drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, Direction.UP, iron_ore_position)
assert burner_drill, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Burner mining drill placed at {burner_drill.position}")

# Place two stone furnaces near the burner mining drill
furnace1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace1, "Failed to place first stone furnace"
print(f"First stone furnace placed at {furnace1.position}")

furnace2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace2, "Failed to place second stone furnace"
print(f"Second stone furnace placed at {furnace2.position}")

# Place inserters between entities
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter1, "Failed to place first inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"First inserter placed at {inserter1.position}")

inserter2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter2, "Failed to place second inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"Second inserter placed at {inserter2.position}")

# Set recipes for furnaces
set_entity_recipe(furnace1, Prototype.IronPlate)
set_entity_recipe(furnace2, Prototype.Steel)

# Add fuel to entities (assuming coal is in inventory)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, burner_drill, 5)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace1, 5)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace2, 5)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter1, 1)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter2, 1)

# Verify setup
entities = inspect_entities(burner_drill.position, radius=10)
assert any(e.name == "burner-mining-drill" for e in entities.entities), "Burner mining drill not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "stone-furnace") == 2, "Two stone furnaces not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "burner-inserter") == 2, "Two burner inserters not found in inspection"

print("Steel smelting chain setup complete and verified")

# Find the nearest iron ore patch within reach
iron_ore_position = None
for radius in range(1, 11):
    entities = inspect_entities(radius=radius)
    for entity in entities.entities:
        if entity.name == "iron-ore":
            iron_ore_position = entity.position
            break
    if iron_ore_position:
        break

# If no iron ore is found, move to a new position and search again
if not iron_ore_position:
    move_to(Position(x=10, y=10))
    for radius in range(1, 11):
        entities = inspect_entities(radius=radius)
        for entity in entities.entities:
            if entity.name == "iron-ore":
                iron_ore_position = entity.position
                break
        if iron_ore_position:
            break

assert iron_ore_position, "No iron ore patch found within reach"

# Place burner mining drill on iron ore patch
burner_drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, Direction.UP, iron_ore_position)
assert burner_drill, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Burner mining drill placed at {burner_drill.position}")

# Place two stone furnaces near the burner mining drill
furnace1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace1, "Failed to place first stone furnace"
print(f"First stone furnace placed at {furnace1.position}")

furnace2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace2, "Failed to place second stone furnace"
print(f"Second stone furnace placed at {furnace2.position}")

# Place inserters between entities
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter1, "Failed to place first inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"First inserter placed at {inserter1.position}")

inserter2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter2, "Failed to place second inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"Second inserter placed at {inserter2.position}")

# Set recipes for furnaces
set_entity_recipe(furnace1, Prototype.IronPlate)
set_entity_recipe(furnace2, Prototype.Steel)

# Add fuel to entities (assuming coal is in inventory)
for entity in [burner_drill, furnace1, furnace2, inserter1, inserter2]:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, entity, 5)

# Verify setup
entities = inspect_entities(burner_drill.position, radius=10)
assert any(e.name == "burner-mining-drill" for e in entities.entities), "Burner mining drill not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "stone-furnace") == 2, "Two stone furnaces not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "burner-inserter") == 2, "Two burner inserters not found in inspection"

print("Steel smelting chain setup complete and verified")

corrections.snippet:
def find_resource(resource_name, max_distance=50):
    for radius in range(1, max_distance + 1):
        entities = inspect_entities(radius=radius)
        for entity in entities.entities:
            if entity.name == resource_name:
                return entity.position
    return None

# Find the nearest iron ore patch
iron_ore_position = find_resource("iron-ore")

# If no iron ore is found, move to different locations and search again
if not iron_ore_position:
    for x, y in [(20, 0), (-20, 0), (0, 20), (0, -20)]:
        move_to(Position(x=x, y=y))
        iron_ore_position = find_resource("iron-ore")
        if iron_ore_position:
            break

assert iron_ore_position, "No iron ore patch found within reach"

# Move close to the iron ore patch if it's too far
if (abs(iron_ore_position.x) > 10 or abs(iron_ore_position.y) > 10):
    move_to(Position(x=iron_ore_position.x, y=iron_ore_position.y))

# Place burner mining drill on iron ore patch
burner_drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, Direction.UP, iron_ore_position)
assert burner_drill, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Burner mining drill placed at {burner_drill.position}")

# Place two stone furnaces near the burner mining drill
furnace1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace1, "Failed to place first stone furnace"
print(f"First stone furnace placed at {furnace1.position}")

furnace2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace2, "Failed to place second stone furnace"
print(f"Second stone furnace placed at {furnace2.position}")

# Place inserters between entities
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter1, "Failed to place first inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"First inserter placed at {inserter1.position}")

inserter2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter2, "Failed to place second inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"Second inserter placed at {inserter2.position}")

# Set recipes for furnaces
set_entity_recipe(furnace1, Prototype.IronPlate)
set_entity_recipe(furnace2, Prototype.Steel)

# Add fuel to entities (assuming coal is in inventory)
for entity in [burner_drill, furnace1, furnace2, inserter1, inserter2]:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, entity, 5)

# Verify setup
entities = inspect_entities(burner_drill.position, radius=10)
assert any(e.name == "burner-mining-drill" for e in entities.entities), "Burner mining drill not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "stone-furnace") == 2, "Two stone furnaces not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "burner-inserter") == 2, "Two burner inserters not found in inspection"

print("Steel smelting chain setup complete and verified")

corrections.snippet:
# Find the nearest iron ore patch
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
assert iron_ore_position, "No iron ore patch found"

# Move closer to the iron ore patch
move_to(iron_ore_position)

# Place burner mining drill on iron ore patch
burner_drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, Direction.UP, iron_ore_position)
assert burner_drill, "Failed to place burner mining drill"
print(f"Burner mining drill placed at {burner_drill.position}")

# Place two stone furnaces near the burner mining drill
furnace1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace1, "Failed to place first stone furnace"
print(f"First stone furnace placed at {furnace1.position}")

furnace2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace2, "Failed to place second stone furnace"
print(f"Second stone furnace placed at {furnace2.position}")

# Place inserters between entities
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter1, "Failed to place first inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"First inserter placed at {inserter1.position}")

inserter2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter2, "Failed to place second inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"Second inserter placed at {inserter2.position}")

# Set recipes for furnaces
set_entity_recipe(furnace1, Prototype.IronPlate)
set_entity_recipe(furnace2, Prototype.Steel)

# Add fuel to entities (assuming coal is in inventory)
coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)
if coal_position:
    move_to(coal_position)
    harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=25)

for entity in [burner_drill, furnace1, furnace2, inserter1, inserter2]:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, entity, 5)

# Verify setup
entities = inspect_entities(burner_drill.position, radius=10)
assert any(e.name == "burner-mining-drill" for e in entities.entities), "Burner mining drill not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "stone-furnace") == 2, "Two stone furnaces not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "burner-inserter") == 2, "Two burner inserters not found in inspection"

print("Steel smelting chain setup complete and verified")

furnace1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace1, "Failed to place first stone furnace"
print(f"First stone furnace placed at {furnace1.position}")

furnace2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT, spacing=1)
assert furnace2, "Failed to place second stone furnace"
print(f"Second stone furnace placed at {furnace2.position}")

# Place inserters between entities
inserter1 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, burner_drill.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter1, "Failed to place first inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter1, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"First inserter placed at {inserter1.position}")

inserter2 = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerInserter, furnace1.position, Direction.RIGHT)
assert inserter2, "Failed to place second inserter"
rotate_entity(inserter2, Direction.RIGHT)
print(f"Second inserter placed at {inserter2.position}")

# Ensure we have coal for fuel
coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)
if coal_position:
    move_to(coal_position)
    harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=25)

# Add fuel to entities
for entity in [burner_drill, furnace1, furnace2, inserter1, inserter2]:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, entity, 5)

# Set recipes for furnaces (after adding fuel)
set_entity_recipe(furnace1, Prototype.IronPlate)
assert get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace1.position).recipe == Prototype.IronPlate.value[0], "Failed to set recipe for first furnace"

set_entity_recipe(furnace2, Prototype.Steel)
assert get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace2.position).recipe == Prototype.Steel.value[0], "Failed to set recipe for second furnace"

# Verify setup
entities = inspect_entities(burner_drill.position, radius=10)
assert any(e.name == "burner-mining-drill" for e in entities.entities), "Burner mining drill not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "stone-furnace") == 2, "Two stone furnaces not found in inspection"
assert sum(1 for e in entities.entities if e.name == "burner-inserter") == 2, "Two burner inserters not found in inspection"

print("Steel smelting chain setup complete and verified")

furnace2_entity = get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, furnace2.position)

assert furnace2_entity.recipe == "steel-plate", "Failed to set recipe for second furnace"
